name: Pong-Out (Sam Hersel, Mornheo, rlebron22)
description:
This is a mashup of Pong and Breakout for 2 players! In it, behind every palette there are bricks. Destroying one will add a new ball to the field making it quite chaotic very fast!

Currrently in build 2 of 3 for the Triple Trijam.

Use W/S for the left palette and arrow up/arrow down for the right one.

Some considerations: there are 2 balls at the beggining (for now), and a ball can only break 1 brick at a time. After a brick is destroyed the ball has to cross the middle of the screen to be able to break another one.
